Text: This is my first torrent that I've uploaded. Fed up with other versions of WebcamXP here on TPB, I finally found a copy that works correctly. Most others that I have found are older versions or does not register properly and you get a nag screen after restarting the app. This is the second newest version as of today and works perfectly.

Kaspersky 2011 reporting 3 trojans - classic trojan material this kind of application as you will be port forwarding the exe

Not installing.

I uploaded the crack and the keygen to http://www.kaspersky.com/scanforvirus and they both came back clean.

I sent the crack, keygen, and the installer to http://scanner.novirusthanks.org which uses 16 scanners to include Kaspersky.

Results:
keygen: http://scanner.novirusthanks.org/analysis/95c33d1e39f0f1bd3ba2833641c85be4/a2V5bWFrZXIuZXhl/
crack: http://scanner.novirusthanks.org/analysis/0e2d2d1ae4fdb1e089593ee72ac81874/d2ViY2FtWFBfUFJPXzVfUGF0Y2guZXhl/
installer: http://scanner.novirusthanks.org/analysis/9b5da889f565bc370d94cea8ad73b42b/d2xpdGU1NTAuZXhl/
F-PROT6 reports infected with W32/Swizzor-based.2!Maximus

I submitted 5.5.0.8 to the scanner directly from their website and it also reports infected.
http://scanner.novirusthanks.org/analysis/2d41fe6f559c3ca9ba3ae981b251cb86/d2xpdGU1NTAuZXhl/

My money is on false positive since I doubt Moonware Studios is sending out a Trojan.

@sluggervillan: Have you tried closing 5.5.0.8 after using the keygen and then open the program again? I've tried using 5.5.0.1 and 5.3.4.348 and both appear to register fine but would give a "You're using a bad serial" nag when starting. Both this torrent and 5.3.1.75 that I used included a crack that I had to use before being able to the app without getting the nag. Please report back.
@sluggervillan: Interesting... Thanks for the update. Might have to check out 5.5.0.8 and see what it has to offer.
could somebody send me a key the keygen won't open for me on either of my computers
@d_sellers1: Awesome torrent dude. Keep up the good work!

works great!!!  Thanx d_sellers1.  I had a bit of trouble initially but then this is what i did.

1.  After patching as administrator  i ran the Keygen as administrator.
2.  In the Keygen box I typed a name then I generated the key. 
3.  I opened Webcamxp and chose pro.
4.  I used the same name and the key generated in the registration page of webcamxp
5.  I used a false email in the email box.
6.  i clicked register and boom it worked.

Hope this helps.
